JumpTo - Your universal shortlink navigator for quick access to your favorite websites.

Two simple ways to use:

üìå In Chrome/Brave:
1. Type 'go' in the address bar
2. Press Tab or Space
3. Enter your shortcut (e.g., 'gh')

üåê In Arc and other browsers:
1. Type 'go/shortcut' in the address bar
   Example: go/gh

Key Features:
- Create custom shortcuts for any website
- Smart suggestions as you type
- Dark mode support
- Search and organize shortcuts
- Usage statistics and tracking
- Import/export functionality
- Keyboard shortcuts (‚åò/Ctrl + K)
- Recent shortcuts history

Perfect for:
- Developers accessing different tools and sites
- Teams using shared shortlinks
- Anyone wanting faster navigation to frequent sites

Example shortcuts:
go/gh ‚Üí github.com
go/gm ‚Üí gmail.com
go/cal ‚Üí calendar.google.com

Get started by adding your first shortcut and experience faster web navigation across all your browsers!
